Description.Text: Art Hotel Astana is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Astana. It boasts a cafe, free Wi-Fi and a good location close to the main attractions. Astana is the fast-growing capital of Kazakhstan and home to several multinational companies. In its centre old Soviet buildings sit next to innovative structures, offering an interesting blend of traditional and futuristic styles. Places of interest include the Baiterek Tower, the Khan Shatyry and The President's Museum of Kazakhstan. Astana train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Astana destinations. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise building with contemporary architecture. Facilities include poker and billiards tables. A range of massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple style. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. The Chillout cafe serves European, Eastern and Italian cuisine. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
